name: Building Crush
overview: Building Crush yours is one! Learn Crush road building and fighting our rivals!! I'll work after the rice is good!! Building Crush! is about taking control of a demolition man that have to destroy a building before the opponent do it. The game is a classic puzzle game, since the buildings are made of different rows of pieces and destroying a row make the final level goal more near. The difficult part is that the bomb can only be placed in opened windows and there others events that makes the work more harder like falling bricks and others things.
